transArray.content: The room is very clean and the service attitude is very good. There is no U port in the room. The front desk provides a charger stand. Although it is a double-layer window, you can still hear the sound of cars on the side near the Fourth Ring Road, but it is not noisy. The disadvantage is the room a bit small

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for your stay. We are glad that you have such a positive review of our hotel. While we strive to create a first-class living environment for our guests, we also need to provide guests with considerate services. Your recognition and affirmation are the basis for the survival and development of our hotel. We hope to serve you again and wish you a happy life!
